message: Hello Bob, I am offering you the exclusive opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $1,800,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate the offer, but I'm willing to go up to $1,400,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the price.  While your offer is appreciated, I'm targeting a figure closer to $1,650,000.  This product has garnered significant interest, and I believe this price point accurately reflects its value.

I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,550,000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value I'll get from the product.
